name: Apex (itch) (Michael Grieshofer, Nickitus, DrManatee)
description:
**Gameplay Hints at Bottom (Spoilers)**

Description:

You are small. You are weak. You are pitiful. But your children don't have to be.

Your genetic code is adaptable. If you die to a hazard, your next of kin will be equipped to deal with it. Adapt, evolve, and become an apex predator.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys: Move

Space/Up: Jump (unlockable)

Left Click: Attack (unlockable)

Made By:

@michael-grieshofer - Coding and menu art

@nickitus - Sound design and music

@drmanatee - Environment and character designs

Made in 3 days for the Wowie Jam with a theme of "Failure is Progress"

Gameplay Hints:

- you need the swimming upgrade to beat the apex predator

- To beat the game, you need to defeat the apex predator which is to the right of your initial spawn point

- You unlock gliding by taking fall damage
